reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, particularly appreciating its pretty pink color and detailed pattern, while also finding it soft and comfortable without being scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, excellent quality
items.body: I was so excited when I put this sweater on and felt how soft, yet tightly woven it is with medium heaviness. My typical size is 8/10 - small/medium, and I chose the medium, which is a perfect fit and sits mid hip. The sleeves are longer and the v-neck lands perfectly. This sweater is versatile and can be worn dressy for work or casual with jeans or shorts. I love it so much I just bought 4 more in different colors! Really love it. Read more
items.author: Julie Reese

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and look, fits to normal size.
items.body: I’m 5’4, 135 pounds, D cup and a Medium fits perfect. The material is quality, it’s soft. You can dress it up or dress it down. I bought in a few colors because the first time I got it was so nice. Warmth is good as well that you can layer it with a tank under Or bra alone for Less warmth and good to go! Read more
items.author: kim

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfortable perfect fall sweater
items.body: So cute! Colors are so pretty together. I love that the length of the sleeves come down over my hand just a little. I hate when shirt’s don’t cover my whole arm. It’s very soft too. Good weight but not too heavy. It’s a good quality product and there is some good stretch to it. Very comfortable all the way around. Only down side is there are little holes in the design and I don’t mind them but I have to wear an undershirt. Which I don’t like doing. Still cute but wish those weren’t there. Read more
items.author: Holly Harden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so soft and comfortable!
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater! I love how soft it is not itchy or scratchy at all. I love the fit. I love the color. I love the pattern. It’s cute tucked in or out. I was shocked how much I even enjoyed wearing it! Looking forward to a date night or dinner with the girls in this stylish perfect for fall/winter sweater! Read more
items.author: Kelsi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The beautiful sweater
items.body: This sweater looks beautiful, it’s very comfortable and the fit is perfect. There’s different colors and they are all pretty. This sweater is nice quality and just makes you feel so good and comfy wearing it. Read more
items.author: Barbaramarthouse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft texture
items.body: Really cute abs flattering sweater. Great fit and perfect length. Good quality Read more
items.author: Lauren McKenzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good, fits good and looks great!
items.body: Material is super soft. Not too heavy and great for wearing under a jacket without being too bulky. FIts great. I like a loose fit so ordered a large, I typically wear a medium. Color looks great and I'm so happy I'm ordering more. Read more
items.author: Robert

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Color was good. Wish it was more oversized but still cute. Comfortable and good material Read more
items.author: KayLee Goodman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-dark Apricot, B-gray, F-colorblock Striped, B-black, F-gray Pink, B-navy Blue, E-black Apricot, B-khaki, B-brown, F-christmas, F-apricot Sriped, B-yellow, B-beige, B-wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
